name: The Three Door Oblique Sideboard
description: A stylish example of contemporary British craftsmanship, the three door Oblique sideboard boasts clean lines and effortless style finished in high gloss or satin timber, with a striking diagonal brushed brass design. The cabinet is flush with three doors on push latches that open to reveal a satin interior with adjustable shelves and the option of a bank of drawers for additional storage if required. It stands on a sleek recessed plinth which gives an overall sense of richness to the design. Named after its angular design, the three door Oblique cabinet is ideal for a dining room, hallway, living room or bedroom with bespoke sizes available for creating luxurious storage with a modern twist.
